title: Saisher
author: Saisher
content: What happened:: HYIP potential Scam Offering 8% Daily For 7 DaysÂ  Official site:STALLTRADEReference Link: https://stalltrade.com/?a=faqPayment Method:Perfectmoney/Bitcoin/Ethereum/USDT/Tron/Litecoin Additional Notes: They offer an unsustainable interest rate and their investment plan is not realistic if you deposit its 100% that you cannot withdraw your money because this is HYIP and it's a high risk and this kind of platform are known to scam peopleSTALLTRADE

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on December 18, 2022, 04:00:26 AMWhat happened:: HYIP potential Scam Offering 8% Daily For 7 Days8% daily? That is 56% in 7 days. No legit business can offers that, it is not possible. People should always know that legit businesses always offer far lower profit like 15% or less interest in a year, but scammers can not do that because they want some kind of offers that can easily make people to invest with them and easily scam them which is the reason they prefer too high profit offers.
